articles.title: Thunder Names Mark Daigneault Head Coach - OKCThunder.com
articles.description: OKLAHOMA CITY, Nov. 11, 2020 – The Oklahoma City Thunder named Mark Daigneault the team’s new head coach, it was announced today by Executive Vice President and General Manager Sam Presti. Per team policy, terms of the deal were not disclosed.
